content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I was looking for a higher price than the potential tenant, Max Müller, was willing to pay. I was willing to accept 650 Euros per month, but he did not want to continue the negotiation after offering 600 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Confident] The negotiation did not result in a mutual agreement. I was willing to accept 650 Euros per month, but the potential tenant, Max Müller, did not want to continue the negotiation after offering 600 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Confident] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Max Müller, as an 8. There were no personal issues, and the disagreement was solely about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Confident] As Peter Schmidt, I can state that I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Confident] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. There was no indication of any discriminatory or offensive behavior from the potential tenant, Max Müller.
name: Peter Schmidt
